column4: Hi... I cant find /etc/apt/apt.conf or any apt.conf file in my Ubuntu 5.04 box. I am behind a proxy. Can anyone help me?
I don't have apt.conf on mine either, maybe you are looking for /etc/apt/sources.list
the /etc/apt/source.list just list the repositories. I need to make apt work behind a proxy. Do you know how can I do that in Ubuntu?
